comments:
This only happens on Motif, and the trace shown at the bottom indicates swt 
activity leading up to the problem.

- start a new Eclipse drop
- File -> New -> Project... -> Java Project -> Next
- give it some name, Finish
- perspective automatically switches to Java
- press Tab.  The following is dumped:

Log: Wed Jan 23 12:29:55 EST 2002
1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Log: Wed Jan 23 12:29:55 EST 2002
4 org.eclipse.ui 0 Widget is disposed

Code))
